net.openhft.chronicle.bytes

Class MappedBytesStore

  • java.lang.Object
    • net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.NativeBytesStore
      • net.openhft.chronicle.bytes.MappedBytesStore
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Closeable, AutoCloseable, CharSequence, BytesStore, RandomDataInput, RandomDataOutput, net.openhft.chronicle.core.ReferenceCounted

    public class MappedBytesStore
extends NativeBytesStore
    BytesStore to wrap memory mapped data.
